Up Up Down Down

The podcast that takes a critical look at the craft of making games. Developers Allen Pike and Nigel Brooke dig in to a new topic each episode with an interesting guest.

Up Up Down Down is currently on hiatus, though we have at least two more episodes coming. Eventually.

6. My Whole Colony Filled Up With Cabbage

Gaslamp Games’ David Baumgart joins us to discuss Clockwork Empires, simulations, and pickled fungi.

  • Rock Paper Shotgun’s wonderful preview of Clockwork Empires
  • Dwarf Fortress Stories
  • Creature training in Black & White
  • Engineering Faith, the ill-fated religion simulator
  • Cube Drone
  • Low Earth Orbit episode 34 on Spacebase DF-9
  • PC Gamer’s gameplay footage of Clockwork Empires
  • Duke Nukem lawsuit
  • Michael Abrash’s talk on what’s next in VR
  • An excruciatingly detailed fungus pickling simulator

Download (1:14:45) • Mar 28, 2014

Up Up Down Down is sponsored by Steamclock Software.
